attributes.action: make all drivers, that drive with un due care, or get 6 points within two years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sit a driver awareness project, i would also like to see that every 8 - 10 years drivers re take a safety test to see they are fit to drive(all ages)i would also like to see that all drivers sit a motorway test and see that driving at night is part of the driving test.
